section.title: File extension/Browser issue!
section.p: When downloading from some mirrors with some browsers (IE?) the archives get a .gz extension instead of .tgz. Please make sure the files are named myfaces-1.0.5.tgz and myfaces-1.0.5-examples.tgz on your local disk. Otherwise there could be problems on unpacking them. Current release 1.0.5 beta

ul.li: Binaries and documentation (API Doc) / myfaces-1.0.5.tgz --> sourceforge.net

section.p: Do you want to get informed on new MyFaces releases? --> Monitor
